descriptionNullable:
The main dataset  on which all the operations are performed are **books.tsv** containing around 406000+ rows. The file contains two columns, **bookurl** and **data** column. Rest of the csv files are extracted files after running the **jupyter** **code**(book0-20.csv, nbook0-20.csv and book_details.csv with pkl files like tags, simi, tfidf.
We have built an **UI** on **Streamlit** with a file name **App1.py** and all the subsidary files required for UI are given in dataset section.
title: Book Recommendation System
subtitle: Dataset of different books
description:
The main dataset  on which all the operations are performed are **books.tsv** containing around 406000+ rows. The file contains two columns, **bookurl** and **data** column. Rest of the csv files are extracted files after running the **jupyter** **code**(book0-20.csv, nbook0-20.csv and book_details.csv with pkl files like tags, simi, tfidf.
We have built an **UI** on **Streamlit** with a file name **App1.py** and all the subsidary files required for UI are given in dataset section.
